entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
